abstract: Ross Douthat Op-Ed column warns of danger Donald J Trump presents to Republican Party, due to combination of his populist appeal and fact that he is running against Republican establishment; cautions Trump's privileged vantage point only gives his populism more credibility; underscores degree to which Republicans must adapt to Trump's message even if he is ultimately defeated.
lead_paragraph: The future of the Republican Party may hinge on whether it absorbs much of his message of discontent or tries to ignore it.

headline.main: Donald Trump, Traitor to His Class
headline.print_headline: Donald Trump, Traitor to His Class

snippet: The future of the Republican Party may hinge on whether it absorbs much of his message of discontent or tries to ignore it.
